text: The Passage Pistol is a small but powerful [[hand crossbow]] manufactured in [[Aundair]]. The nation has a long history of dueling; while members of [[wizard circles|arcane order]] use magic in duels, the Passage Pistol was developed as an alternative for other duelists. This hand crossbow has spread across the [[Five Nations]], but it is still most closely associated with [[Passage]] and dueling.
title: Passage Pistol
